p: Suitable habitat for the endemic species of the Albertine Rift region (current and future ranges) were estimated using the Maximum Entropy (Maxent), species distribution modeling algorithm [1], [2]. Climate predictor variables used in the species distribution modeling were downloaded from the WorldClim database ( Table 1; [1], [3]). The projected future ranges were based on the 2080 estimates from the Special Report on Emissions Scenarios (SRES) and 2070 for the Representative Concentration Pathways (RCPs) ( Table 2).
